title: Imagine Riot's balancing team were so bad...
body:
that to play op champions you had to pay IP even after you brought them.

Would you ditch?

replies.body:
Irelia and Yasuo must be so expensive after that.

I find it kind of silly how champions aren't even free. Must suck for new players.
So true Rav, the fact that new players have to grind their way into the shop is just grotesque.
yeah what does that have to do with balance team.
That has more to do with eCommerce than it does the balance team.
its the exact opposite...you PAY in IP for playing under powered champs. not directly, but by the losses you get instead of wins. lel
Depends if thresh was considered op
